sun tzu said there are five ways of
attacking with
fire the first is to burn soldiers in

the second is to burn stores the third
is to burn
baggage trains the fourth is to burn

is to hurl dropping fire amongst the

in order to carry out an attack we must

means available the material for raising

should always be kept in readiness
there is a proper season for making

the proper season is when the weather is

the wall the wing or the crossbar
for these four days are all days of

in attacking with fire one should be
prepared to meet
five possible developments when fire

respond at once with an attack from

if there is an outbreak of fire but the

abide your time and do not attack when
